properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The content to show as a hint, before anything is typed.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: When enabled is false, the input's content can't be changed

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the input to be typed. Examples: text, number, email. On mobile platforms will change the layout of the keyboard.

events.name: onChange
events.description: Function to be called when the value of the field changes. The function is called with the current value of the field.

events.name: onBlur
events.description: Function to be called when the field loses focus. The function is called with the current value of the field.

events.name: onFocus
events.description: Function to be called when the field gains focus. The function is called with the current value of the field.
